entry.title: Presto Chango
entry.content: TaDa! I've changed to WordPress (I'm a band-wagon jumper). I'm working to set it up the way I like it, so please bear with me. The gallery is coming back, promise, and maybe with some new pics!! Hopefully I can get her back to where I like her.. but I DO enjoy the theme I'm using (not mine nor my pic).

entry.title: You're all CRAZY...
entry.content:
... if you think I deleted my last blog posting.

:P

entry.title: Time for a Change...
entry.content:
I realized that I'm no longer feeling green-and-orange, the old template colours. I'm a bit more muted... a little more introspective. Looking across the proverbial ocean at the future. So, I've made some changes. Feel free to find errors, critique something, tell me you like it, whatever. I know I need some sort of separator line between postings.. that irks me. But generally, I'm okay with it.

And I've updated my Random Links.... though I must admit, the sidebar's a little wonky right now, especially in Internet Explorer.

entry.title: Not the Real Thing
entry.content:
I thought this article, It's All About Me, was interesting, especially since I've been misunderstood recently, not in email, but in message boards and blogs I regularly comment on... and well, my own blog too. As stated in the article,

First and foremost, e-mail lacks cues like facial expression and tone of voice. That makes it difficult for recipients to decode meaning well.

Which is why every email, blog posting and message board posting should be accompanied by a face shot... preferably of the poster, but if one isn't available you can use a substitute.
